snippet.title: Friday, January 22, 1999
snippet.description:
Friday, January 22, 1999
By Thomas Lepri 09:26 AM EST 01/22/99
It's a sharply downside day on Wall Street; DaimlerChrysler looks at Nissan; AT&T weighs an @Home deal.
http://www.thestreet.com/story/679471/1/friday-january-22-1999.html

snippet.title: Tuesday, February 2, 1999
snippet.description:
Tuesday, February 2, 1999
By Thomas Lepri 09:29 AM EST 02/02/99
It's a negative open on Wall Street; Baker Hughes sets job cuts; Brazil's central bank president steps down.
http://www.thestreet.com/story/709520/1/tuesday-february-2-1999.html

snippet.title: Thursday, January 21, 1999
snippet.description:
Thursday, January 21, 1999
By Thomas Lepri 02:08 PM EST 01/21/99
Stocks slump to their worst levels of the session; Ameritech and Genentech report.

snippet.title: Tuesday, February 2, 1999
snippet.description:
Tuesday, February 2, 1999
By Thomas Lepri 10:46 AM EST 02/02/99
Stocks are firmly lower; Medtronic gets an approval; China shutters insolvent state trusts.

snippet.title: Thursday, January 21, 1999
snippet.description:
Thursday, January 21, 1999
By Thomas Lepri 04:43 PM EST 01/21/99
IBM beats the Street by two 2 cents and DLJ comes in 30 cents lower than last year.
